search.name: A9 - The Amazon.com Search
search.description:
Use A9 to search the web and "Search Inside the Book™" on Amazon.com or within A9 mapping services. Includes helpful search history features.
Example:
a9 windows crash
a9 95383 /map
a9 sacramento, ca /map
